## LAUNCH\_OPTIONS\_ALLOWLIST\_FILENAME variable

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

The filename used to store the launch options allowlist. Stored in the user's home directory/.playwright-browser-tunnel folder.

**Signature:**

```typescript
LAUNCH_OPTIONS_ALLOWLIST_FILENAME: string
```
